My Book Reviews.Title: Babel, or the Necessity of Violence
My Book Reviews.Likes: The characters really came to life, I felt like I was in the action, I enjoyed the long prose and explainations at the bottom of the page.
My Book Reviews.Dislikes: N/A. I loved the whole thing.
My Book Reviews.Final Thoughts: A wonderful tradgey that ends on a hopeful note.

My Book Reviews.Title: The Short Second Life of Bree Tanner
My Book Reviews.Final Thoughts: Loved it, in my opinion one of the best books of the Twilight saga

My Book Reviews.Title: I Was Born For This
My Book Reviews.Dislikes: Practically Everything else, everyone but Jimmy fell flat and fake
My Book Reviews.Final Thoughts: I likely never read this book again.
